Name: Sweet Match 3
About the game: Sweet Match 3 is a simple match 3 game. Drag and drop the candy and get a high score. Made in Construct 3. Enjoy your game! The game has nice graphics and music. Collect as many Jelly as you can and get the most points. Forward! The game is waiting for you: - many jelles - Pleasant music - set of points Sweet Match 3 is Nice time killer.a
